name: necromancer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who claims to communicate with the dead in order to discover what is going to happen in the future, or who is involved in black magic (= magic used for bad purposes): Leonardo da Vinci was thought to be a necromancer due to his extensive knowledge of human anatomy and his study of dead bodies. Necromancers were familiar with the spirits. See
necromancy
More examplesFewer examplesThey're crazed necromancers, communicating with the spirits of the dead in order to influence the future.It was a sin for a Catholic to consult a witch or a necromancer.They fear her because she can control them with her necromancer powers.
